settings.name: shuffle_level_order
settings.description: Shuffles the order of kitchens on the overworld map. Also draws from DLC maps.

settings.name: include_horde_levels
settings.description: Includes "Horde Defence" levels in the pool of possible kitchens when Shuffle Level Order is enabled. Also adds two horde-specific items into the item pool.

settings.name: prep_levels
settings.description: Choose How "Prep Levels" are handled (levels where the timer does not start until the first order is served).

values.name: excluded
values.description: Prep Levels are excluded from the pool during level shuffling.

values.name: all_you_can_eat
values.description: Prep Levels may appear, but the timer automatically starts. The star score requirements are also adjusted to use the All You Can Eat World Record (if it exists).

settings.name: kevin_levels
settings.description: Includes the 8 Kevin level locations on the map as unlockables. Turn off to make games shorter.

settings.name: fix_bugs
settings.description:
Fixes Bugs Present in the base game:
 - Double Serving Exploit
 - Sink Bug
 - Control Stick Cancel/Throw Bug
 - Can't Throw Near Empty Burner Bug

settings.name: shorter_level_duration
settings.description:
Modifies level duration to be about ⅓ shorter than in the original game, thus bringing the item discovery pace in line with other popular Archipelago games.
Points required to earn stars are scaled accordingly. ("Boss Levels" which change scenery mid-game are not affected.)

settings.name: short_horde_levels
settings.description: Modifies horde levels to contain roughly ⅓ fewer waves than in the original game.

settings.name: always_preserve_cooking_progress
settings.description: Modifies the game to behave more like All You Can Eat, where adding an item to an in-progress container doesn't reset the entire progress bar.

settings.name: always_serve_oldest_order
settings.description: Modifies the game so that serving an expired order doesn't target the ticket with the highest tip. This helps players dig out of a broken tip combo faster.

settings.name: display_leaderboard_scores
settings.description: Modifies the Overworld map to fetch and display the current world records for each level. Press number keys 1-4 to view leaderboard scores for that number of players.

settings.name: stars_to_win
settings.description:
Number of stars required to unlock 6-6.
Level purchase requirements between 1-1 and 6-6 will be spread between these two numbers. Using too high of a number may result in more frequent generation failures, especially when horde levels are enabled.

settings.name: star_threshold_scale
settings.description: How difficult should the third star for each level be on a scale of 1-100%, where 100% is the current world record score and 45% is the average vanilla 4-star score.
